sentences.english: Each disaccharide is composed of two monosaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 每一種雙糖都是由兩個單糖組成。

sentences.english: Results The disaccharide in the RV enteritis is obviously increase.
sentences.chinese: 結果RV腸炎大便中的雙糖明顯增加。

sentences.english: Maltose which can be obtained by hydrolysis of starch is an example of a disaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 麥芽糖可由澱粉水解獲得，是雙糖的一個例子。

sentences.english: This method is applied to mono -, di-, and trisaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 這個方法可以應用在單醣，雙糖甚至是三醣上。

sentences.english: Disaccharides refers to a carbohydrate in which two monosaccharides are joined by dehydration synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 雙糖是指由兩個單糖經脫水縮合連在一起的糖類。
